Squizzy::
She tried to help the bot up. "How did this happen? Oh, ah, My name 
is Squizzy. What's your's?"  She knelt dwn and took the bot's arm.  
She then stood to help the bot walk.  Squizzy used all her might to 
get this bot into the ship. She was over joyed to have another bot to 
talk to other than that Lady Hawk. Lady Hawk wasn't really a bad bot, 
but her attitude was getting on her nerves. And she could only go so 
long with the nice and fluff routine.  She helped the bot towards the 
lab and to the CR room.   She carefully set the bot into the 
CR. "Just get better.  Our leader will want to talk to you when you 
get out."  She smiled and then closed the door.  She turned on the CR 
and then sat down.  She had used every once of her energy to get that 
bot to the cr.  Thought Squizzy was small, she was tough.  Well...to 
a point.


KitKat::
She was rather pleased with how the talks went.  She felt that 
perhaps, with luck from the matrix, that this could really happen.  
The uniting of the Predacons.  She felt like this was the start of a 
new rain for the Predacon Empire On Earth.

Predacons

on top of

said in a

and the risk

will come to
